Sales and Support teams' availability

  • Monday - Friday: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM *
  • Saturday - Sunday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM *

* [Melbourne/Sydney Time]

That’s why we offer a variety of contact options to help you get in touch with us whenever you need. Our sales and support teams are available from 10 am to 7 pm from Monday to Friday and from 10 am to 2 pm on Saturday and Sunday, so you can always reach us when you need to.

For those who prefer to speak to us directly, you can call us on +61 3 7046 4648 during our opening hours. If you prefer to reach us via email, simply send us a message at hello@thehamperboutique.com.au, and one of our friendly representatives will be happy to assist you.

In addition to our phone and email support, you can also reach us through our social media channels, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and Pinterest. We’re active on all these platforms, so you can always find us online. Simply follow us at the links provided below and get in touch with us anytime you need!
